# Spring Boot Expense Tracker - Project Setup

## Checklist

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements - Production-grade Expense Tracker Backend
- [x] Scaffold the Project - Create Spring Boot project structure
- [x] Customize the Project - Add all required features
- [ ] Install Required Extensions - Java Extension Pack
- [ ] Compile the Project - Maven install
- [ ] Create and Run Task - Spring Boot Run
- [ ] Launch the Project
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete - README.md created

## Project: Expense Tracker Backend System
**Status**: ✅ Complete Spring Boot application created with:
- ✅ 5 Models (User, Expense, Category, Budget, RefreshToken)
- ✅ 5 Repositories with custom queries
- ✅ 5 Services (Auth, Expense, Category, Budget, Analytics)
- ✅ 5 Controllers with full REST APIs
- ✅ JWT Security with refresh tokens
- ✅ Redis Caching
- ✅ AWS S3 File Upload
- ✅ Email Notifications
- ✅ Rate Limiting
- ✅ Global Exception Handling
- ✅ Swagger Documentation
- ✅ Docker Support
- ✅ Comprehensive README

**Next Steps**: Compile and run the application
